bio:
Mirmulnir is a dragon that attacks the western watchtower near of Whiterun.
Mirmulnir was among one of the very few dragons that were not killed by the Blades. He was last showed himself to humans in the Reach in 2E 212, and did not reappear until this year.
Mirmulnir's primary weapons are his razor-sharp teeth and his powerful Fire Breath shout.
name: Mirmulnir
